benchmark_details.name: ComVID (Complaint Video Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: ComVID is a video complaint dataset containing 1,175 complaint videos and the corresponding descriptions, annotated with the emotional state of the complainer, aimed at generating expressive complaints from videos.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a platform for users to articulate complaints through video, improving engagement with e-commerce platforms.

data.source: Collected from Amazon review videos focusing on electronic and non-electronic products.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by a team of linguists for complaint descriptions and emotional states.

methodology.calculation: CR score is calculated as the average of sentiment score, emotion detection, and aspect identification.
methodology.interpretation: A higher CR score indicates better retention of complaint nature in the generated complaints.
methodology.validation: Validated through multiple phases of expert annotation and human evaluation.
